title: The $200 iPhone X Wireless Charger You Don't Need...

Now, going into this, I wanted to be as objective as possible. Without a doubt, the number one reason why you wouldn't buy this is the price. 200 bucks is a lot of money. The problem with that is that it's small and kinda screams, "Take me, move me, "and put me in a place you're not gonna find me after." What's also cool with this is that it's kinda stealthy, and at first glance, I don't think anyone would know or guess that this is a piece of tech. The one thing I wouldn't expect with this, though, are fast charging times. I think for the most part, that's kind of expected with wireless chargers.
